meanings.definition: The act of unrolling or spreading out.
meanings.sent1: The rollout of the carpet was done carefully to avoid any wrinkles.
meanings.sent2: The rollout of the map revealed the entire hiking trail.
meanings.sent3: During the magic show, the magician's rollout of the red carpet turned into a river of flowers!
meanings.sent4: The rollout of the red carpet for the celebrity event was like a grand welcome to all guests.
meanings.sent5: The rollout of the banner at the stadium was so smooth, it caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The introduction or launch of a new product or service.
meanings.sent1: The company's rollout of the new phone was met with great excitement from customers.
meanings.sent2: The successful rollout of the marketing campaign boosted sales significantly.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the rollout of the surprise cake left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: The rollout of the latest fashion line was like a breath of fresh air in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The grand rollout of the new menu at the restaurant attracted many curious diners.

meanings.definition: To spread or extend over a surface.
meanings.sent1: She carefully rollout the dough to make perfectly round cookies.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to rollout the paint to create a beautiful mural.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful rollout of the yarn made a mess in the living room.
meanings.sent4: His laughter seemed to rollout across the entire room, infecting everyone with joy.
meanings.sent5: The warm sunlight began to rollout over the horizon, signaling the start of a new day.
